page.title: 17SPORTS AND ACTIVITIES
page.content: When pupils were asked about out of school activities the most popular sports were swimming, diving,football and judo. Over 10% of the school goes dancing. Some of the different types of dancing were ballet, country dancing, tap dancing and popmobility. Other popular sports were gymnastics, cricket, tennis and horse riding. The most popular indoor pastime is chess. There are more pursuing sports in the upper juniors than in lower juniors. Of the musical activities most popular instrument is the piano with 10% of pupils having lessons here. A quarter of pupils play instruments, others sing in choirs in and out of school or play recorders. 33% of the school are involved in Scouts,Cubs,Brownies or Guides. Some older children do sailing, buggy racing, Kung-Fu lessons and elocution.
